column1: @entity1 bought a new house and wanted to start a garden in his backyard. He asked his friend @entity0 to go with him to the store. @entity1 and @entity0 went to the store on Saturday to pick out soil and seeds. They went into the big store and passed by many other things like jewelry, books, and movies, and then they reached the garden section. The store's garden section was huge! They had vegetable seeds, plant seeds, and flower seeds. @entity1 wanted to grow cucumbers, tomatoes, lettuce, corn, and potatoes. @entity0 helped him find those vegetable seeds. The next day, @entity1 started to plant the seeds. In a few weeks, there were lots of vegetables growing in his garden! He began to pick the vegetables and use them when he cooked. He also gave them away as gifts to his family and friends. They loved his vegetables! Soon, @entity1 wanted to make his garden even bigger. He went back to the garden store and bought seeds to plant more vegetables. Soon his whole backyard was full of delicious vegetables!
he wanted to start a garden.
@placeholder did @entity1 ask to help him at the garden store
